steps.title: Code 10-67 is a police code.
steps.content: Code 10-67 is a police code. steps.title: There are multiple Holy Bible passages numbered â€œ6:7â€ as well.
steps.content: There are multiple Holy Bible passages numbered â€œ6:7â€ as well. In the Bible, sections are numbered within chapters; each chapter is subdivided into sentences or verses. [7] X Research source For example, Matthew 6:7 is a Bible verse urging Christians to pray from the heart rather than babbling repetitively over and over again.
